rules_text:
Trample
Trample over planeswalkers [i](This creature can deal excess combat damage to the controller of the planeswalker it’s attacking.)[/i]
Trample over players [i](This creature can deal excess combat damage dealt to a player to another player.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Nandi Bear

Mechanical Uniqueness — Trample over players keyword by Tuxxle
